ai-mil3.3.1:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, what is the root of an elephant’s root? What is the root of the past? What is the root of the future?”
ai-mil3.3.1:1.3_0: “Great king, this is the root, and the future is the root, but the tied up of ignorance is the root in the present.
ai-mil3.3.1:1.4_0: ignorance is a condition for choices. Name and form are a condition for consciousness. Name and form are conditions for the six sense fields. The six sense fields are conditions for contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving. Craving is a condition for grasping. Grasping is a condition for continued existence. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth. Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, for grief, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
ai-mil3.3.1:1.5_0: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases without anything left over.”
ai-mil3.3.1:3.1_0: The root of the tree is the first (but),
